metadata.title: CVE-2023-0482 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In RESTEasy the insecure File.createTempFile() is used in theDataSourceProvider, FileProvider and Mime4JWorkaround classes which createstemp files with insecure permissions that could be read by a local user.

criterions.comment: resteasy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
